name: sd-card-checker
description: Instantly find the perfect SD card for any device

scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:css && npm run build:site && npx http-server dist
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:css && npm run build:site
scripts.dev: npm run build:site && concurrently "tailwindcss -i ./src/css/input.css -o ./src/css/tailwind.css --watch" "npm run build:site" "http-server dist"

author: SD Card Checker
